[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: ISS defines requirements for an inventory and streaming system ensuring automation, security, and usability.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: ISS supports on-demand movie streaming, secure payments, user authentication, and personalized account management for seamless entertainment access.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: ISS integrates with payment gateways, streaming, and authentication systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: ISS provides a React.js UI with Tailwind CSS and role-based access.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: ISS runs on scalable cloud infrastructure.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: ISS uses FastAPI for payments and HLS for streaming.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: ISS uses REST APIs with TLS 1.3 and AES-256 encryption.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: ISS enables secure streaming, real-time payments, and multi-device account access.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: ISS supports 24/7 streaming with automated updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: ISS supports multilingual UI and accessibility.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: ISS links to financial and compliance systems.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: ISS provides secure on-demand streaming, real-time payment processing, and a dynamic user account system with multi-device accessibility.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: ISS serves customers, admins, and content managers.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: ISS requires internet connectivity and browser compatibility.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: ISS depends on payment, media, and authentication services.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with Stripe API for payment processing.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall interface with HLS streaming for movie playback.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall allow customers to register, log in, and manage accounts efficiently, supporting multi-factor authentication for enhanced security.
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall generate retrospective Inventory Adjustment documents (REQ-INTF-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide an intuitive React.js UI for account management and browsing.
[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-002: The system shall allow users to access movies within 2 clicks after login, ensuring intuitive browsing experience.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process credit card transactions in under 15 seconds (REQ-INTF-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support 50 simultaneous streams (REQ-INTF-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall use PostgreSQL for transactions and Redis caching (REQ-FUNC-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with W3C web standards.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-002: The system shall update content every Friday (REQ-FUNC-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall comply with PCI DSS for payment security.
[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-002: The system shall follow OWASP security best practices.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall maintain 99.5% uptime, implementing automated recovery mechanisms to minimize downtime and service disruptions.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Functional testing for streaming, accounts, and security.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: Security policies, API guides, and compliance.
[SEC] 5. References: PCI DSS, cloud security, streaming optimization.
